# claude-ide

> Browser-based real-time IDE for AI coding agents (Claude Code, Gemini CLI, Codex). Rust backend + SolidJS frontend + WASM modules.

## Core Documentation (read first)
- [README](README.md): Overview, quick start, architecture, configuration
- [Implementation Plan](IMPL-PLAN.md): Full TOGAF ADM Level L architecture (20 work packages, 11 ADRs)
- [Contributing](CONTRIBUTING.md): Development workflow, commit conventions, code style
- [Testing](TESTING.md): Test strategy, gate matrix, performance benchmarks

## Architecture Decisions
- ADR-1: Rust backend (tokio + io_uring)
- ADR-2: SolidJS frontend (fine-grained reactivity)
- ADR-3: Zenoh + SHM event bus (~1us latency)
- ADR-4: Limbo DB (io_uring, FTS5, async)
- ADR-5: eBPF file watcher (PID attribution)
- ADR-6: hecs ECS state engine (struct-of-arrays)
- ADR-7: FlatBuffers (hot path) + MessagePack (cold path)
- ADR-8: WebTransport-only (QUIC, 0-RTT)
- ADR-9: PTY stdin + tmux send-keys (session control)
- ADR-10: Catppuccin Mocha theme
- ADR-11: CodeMirror 6 editor

## Code Patterns
- [Rust Patterns](.claude/rules/rust-patterns.md): ECS, error handling, Zenoh topics
- [SolidJS Patterns](.claude/rules/solidjs-patterns.md): Signals, tokens, virtual scroller
- [WASM Patterns](.claude/rules/wasm-patterns.md): Workers, SharedArrayBuffer, COOP/COEP

## Security
- [Security Policy](SECURITY.md): Vulnerability reporting, response timeline
